# Bridging  
made easy.

rhino.fi is the ultimate Layer 2 bridge for effortless multi-chain token
movement.

__ Go to bridge

Total Volume

$2.35BN

Total Transactions

48.8M+

Total Accounts

1,000,000+

Transaction Time

<60 sec

# The Ultimate Cross-Chain Experience

We’ve worked hard to build a seamless bridging experience so you can move
cross-chain in one click.

### Quick and Secure  
Transactions

Experience lightning-fast transactions on rhino.fi, ensuring your assets move
across chains swiftly and securely. Our platform's speed is matched only by
its robust security measures.

### Seamless Self-Custodial Interoperability​

rhino.fi offers seamless self-custodial interoperability, providing control
and accessibility. With rhino.fi, you have the power to manage your assets
effortlessly across various chains.

### Low-Cost Transactions High-Value Experience​

rhino.fi’s mission is to help onbaord the next billion users to DeFi. Our fee
model reflects this to support all users to make the most of DeFi.
